sentences.en: A physician is someone who specializes in psychiatry.
sentences.cn: 精神病专家是专门从事精神病治疗的人。

sentences.en: In it, he argued that psychiatry was a branch of medical science and should be investigated by observation and experimentation like the other natural sciences.
sentences.cn: 在书中，他主张精神病学是医学的一个分支，应当像其他自然科学一样以观察和实验为研究手段。

sentences.en: It appears this month in the Archives of General Psychiatry.
sentences.cn: 这个月在《普通精神病学档案》上发表.

sentences.en: Objective : To investigate the causes of discharge from Department of psychiatry.
sentences.cn: 目的: 探讨精神科住院患者自动出院的原因.

sentences.en: Objective To realize characteristics of murder case by forensic psychiatry expertise.
sentences.cn: 目的了解司法精神医学鉴定中凶杀案的案例特征.

sentences.en: Psychiatry has the character of interdiscipline.
sentences.cn: 精神病学具有跨学科性质。

sentences.en: Psychiatry is an accepted branch of medicine.
sentences.cn: 精神病学是公认的医学分支。

sentences.en: Psychiatry is the area of medicine that treats mental and emotional conditions.
sentences.cn: 精神病学是对待心理和情绪条件的医学领域.

sentences.en: The concept of transference was formally brought into psychiatry by Sigmund Freud.
sentences.cn: 移情这一概念是由西格蒙德·弗洛伊德正式引入精神医学的.

sentences.en: The condition is practically unknown outside psychiatry clinics.
sentences.cn: 除了医院的精神病科外，这种病几乎不为人知。

sentences.en: The finding was reported in the February Archives of General Psychiatry.
sentences.cn: 这项发现发表在二月份的《普通精神病学档案》上.

sentences.en: The findings appeared last month in Archives of General Psychiatry.
sentences.cn: 结果发表在上个月的《普通精神病学纪要》中.

sentences.en: The findings are in this month month's Archives of General Psychiatry.
sentences.cn: 其研究结果发表在本月的《普通精神病学文献》上.

sentences.en: The findings are in this month's Archives of General Psychiatry.
sentences.cn: 其研究成果登载于本月的《普通精神病学文献》中.

sentences.en: The psychiatry of contemporary has involved two crisis of method.
sentences.cn: 当代精神病学先后经历了两次方法危机.

sentences.en: The work is reported in Monday's issue of the journal Molecular Psychiatry.
sentences.cn: 这项研究刊登在了6月16日的期刊《分子精神病学》上.
